definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
lit. it's the soft persimmons that people choose to squeeze (idiom)/fig. it's the weak (i.e. 軟柿子|软柿子[ruan3 shi4 zi5]) who get picked on/bullies pick soft targets
pinyin: shi4 zi5 tiao1 ruan3 de5 nie1

sentences.english: The process design for reconstruction and expansion engineering of Hunan Shizhuyuan Bismuth Smelter is described.
sentences.chinese: 介紹湖南柿竹園公司鉍冶煉改擴建的工藝設計。

sentences.english: Persimmon anthracnose is one of the major diseases attacking persimmon trees in Shangzhou.
sentences.chinese: 柿炭疽病是陝西商洛柿樹的主要病害之一。

sentences.english: Mopan persimmon was confirmed as respiration climacteric fruit.
sentences.chinese: 確定磨盤柿爲呼吸躍變型果實。

sentences.english: The text studied on processing technology of persimmon pendant, the quality was improved.
sentences.chinese: 研究了柿墜的加工工藝以改進產品質量。

sentences.english: The dewatering feature of the fluorite concentrate in Shizhuyuan Mine has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了柿竹園螢石精礦的脫水特性。

sentences.english: Diospyros spp. industry is one of key industries to develop forestry in Huaning.
sentences.chinese: 柿產業是華寧縣發展林業產業的重點之一。

definition: binzi/a species of apple which is slightly sour and astringent
